lead_paragraph: The mechanics of the deal that would send Kevin Garnett to the Celtics calls into question the real value of a high-priced veteran All-Star compared with first- and second-round draft picks who have yet to develop.
snippet: The mechanics of the deal that would send Kevin Garnett to the Celtics calls into question the real value of a high-priced veteran All-Star compared with first- and second-round draft picks who have yet to develop.
